short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily import Gmail Emails, Google Calendar Events and Chrome Web Pages into Legal Files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Legal Case Management Software Provides Productivity

Legal Files Software, Inc. has developed a legal case and matter management application which helps legal and other professionals more easily and efficiently manage their contacts, emails, documents, calendars and other file-related items. This Chrome Extension easily imports emails from Gmail, Google calendar events and Chrome web pages into Legal Files.

Legal Files is an intuitive, affordable, off-the-shelf legal case management software. Its customers have trusted Legal Files for 30+ years to run their offices more efficiently.

Note: This extension is a companion to Legal Files Software for existing users and requires a license. Please contact Legal Files at Support@LegalFiles.com for assistance.
